text: I had a great experience, the food is tasty, and the speed it comes out at is astonishing.  The prices are relatively economic, but there are still some pricy food items. The enviornment is clean and the staff is very friendly. Overall, it was a good outing, and I would recommend to give this place a try.

name: Paulina Williams
text: The last two times I‚Äôve ordered online I have been totally disappointed. It seems unless you are there to watch them make your pizza they don‚Äôt care how it turns out.  Things missing & barely any toppings. Just bad pizza.

text: staff was friendly, restaurant was clean and got my order fast even do it was very busy. Pizza was burned as well as the garlic nots, not only mine but others too. I still prefer pieology.

text: Came here on a Friday night with my family. And overall it was an ok experience. The fast personalized pizza concept is nice. Nothing great or bad. I think their service could be better; It's a bit amateur. The employees were out of sync ‚Ä¶More

text: Consistently burnt pizza. Guy makes my pizza and burns it, then remakes it and burns it again. If you get someone competant it's good pizza but last few times have been bad so I won't continue to go here

text: A pizza in 90 seconds is a great giimack if only it was tasty.  I wont be back.

One price for all the toppings you want, what can be better?

text: I love Blaze pizza.  I can't have dairy, so they make me a pizza with different veggies, and I always ask them to do just an extremely light sprinkle of parmesan so there is a hint of cheese, which they not only do, but they get it right every time!

name: gees10
text: This is my first time here at this location on Sahara and Hualapai. The store just opened last November. The employees are helpful and always service with a smile. I always order the BYO - Build-Your-Own and load it up with cheese, meats and veggies. Ingredients are fresh. Doesnt take too long for it to bake.
